pos_mean_info_list.mean: 令人兴奋的；使人激动的
易激动的；易兴奋的；易怒的
兴奋；刺激；令人兴奋的事物
[生理] 兴奋性，应激性；可激发性

word_group.brief_definition: 对…感到兴奋；为…感到激动

bilingual.source: The main reason why they were so excited is that pandas are just so cute!
bilingual.target: 他们如此兴奋的主要原因是熊猫实在太可爱了！

bilingual.source: Before the show, hundreds of excited visitors waited in their seats eagerly.
bilingual.target: 演出前，数百名兴奋的观众急切地坐在座位上等待。
我们对这次旅行是感到兴奋的。

bilingual.source: The stadium was packed with excited fans.
bilingual.target: 体育场里塞满了兴奋的球迷。

bilingual.source: She always acts loopy when she's excited.
bilingual.target: 她兴奋的时候总是表现得有点疯疯癫癫的。

bilingual.source: The venue was packed with excited concertgoers.
bilingual.target: 场地挤满了兴奋的演唱会观众。

bilingual.source: The concert venue was packed with excited fans.
bilingual.target: 音乐会的场地挤满了兴奋的粉丝。

bilingual.source: The concert hall was jam-packed with excited fans.
bilingual.target: 音乐厅挤满了兴奋的粉丝。

bilingual.source: The DJ played a danceable track that made everyone excited.
bilingual.target: DJ播放了一首让每个人都很兴奋的适合跳舞的曲子。
这是多么令人兴奋的消息！

list.abstract: excited 英音：[ik'saitid] 美音：[ɪk'saɪtɪd] adj. 兴奋的；激动的；活跃的v. 激动；唤起（excite的过去分词） [比较级more excited 最高级most excited ] 它的 主语是人或物。

yingyinNormal.en: Right, we're not supposed to get all excited about this opening tonight.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好的，开张之夜咱们不该这么兴奋的。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, sure. She was probably up all night excited about the party she knows is happening.
yingyinNormal.zh: 喔，当然，他昨晚知道要办一个派对就兴奋的睡不着。

yingyinNormal.en: Everyone is excited to be playing a pirate game. Hello, Grandpa Pig. We are on our way. Jolly good.
yingyinNormal.zh: 每个人都很兴奋的想要玩这个海盗游戏。你好，猪爷爷，我们要出发了。非常好。非常好。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm sad about it, but I know they're going to turn up somewhere else, so, I'm kind of excited about going on a boat.
yingyinNormal.zh: 虽然我很沮丧，但我知道它们会在某个地方再出现，所以我对于要坐船走还挺兴奋的。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《大卫·贝克汉姆：探索未知之境》

yingyinNormal.en: Think of how excited he's gonna be when we go out and surprise him. Plus we get to have our own, ani-Vegas-ary. A-Nevadaversary.
yingyinNormal.zh: 到时我们突然出现，他一定很兴奋的，而且我们自己还有拉斯维加斯纪念日，内华达纪念日！

yingyinNormal.en: And here is what he's so excited about. It's America's newest auto plant, a billion-dollar state-of-the-art facility filled with all of the latest technology.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是他非常兴奋的一点，这是美国最先进的汽车化计划，价值大约十亿，配备了最先进的科技成果。

yingyinNormal.en: But I thought I'd be more excited.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我以为自己会更兴奋呢。

yingyinNormal.en: Hi, we are so, so excited about this.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你好，我们现在超级激动。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, being excited isn't a guarantee of anything.
yingyinNormal.zh: 兴奋也不能保证什么啊。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, I'm so excited!
yingyinNormal.zh: 噢，我好激动。

yingyinNormal.en: So, do you want the gig? Wait, really? I'm so excited! Well, I'm so excited!
yingyinNormal.zh: 那么，你接受这份工作吗？等等，真的吗？我太激动了！我也很激动！

yingyinNormal.en: Don't get all excited, okay? I promise to not be excited! I used to think hope was for suckers.
yingyinNormal.zh: 别激动，好吗？我保证不激动！我以前认为希望是给弱者的。

yingyinNormal.en: Honey, she's upset. You're her boyfriend. You have to at least try to be excited by the things she's excited by.
yingyinNormal.zh: 亲爱的，她生气了，你是他男朋友，你至少也该试着为她高兴的事而高兴吧。

yingyinNormal.en: The children are very excited to meet you, Your Majesty. I'm excited to meet all of you. And now, for Miss Rabbit's medal.
yingyinNormal.zh: 孩子们见到你非常兴奋，女王陛下！我见到你们也很兴奋，这是兔子小姐的奖牌！

yingyinNormal.en: The children are very excited to meet you, Your Majesty. I'm excited to meet all of you. And now, for Miss Rabbit's medal.
yingyinNormal.zh: 孩子们见到你非常兴奋，女王陛下！我见到你们也很兴奋，这是兔子小姐的奖牌！

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, I would love too. Yeah? Oh, she'd be so excited.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好啊。她会很高兴。

yingyinNormal.en: It's my first day back at work. I'm excited. Sure. Sure?
yingyinNormal.zh: 今天是我第一天回去上班，我很激动。当然啦。当然啦。

yingyinNormal.en: So are you excited about your first night away from Emma?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你很高兴你第一次可以离开艾玛 晚上出去玩吗？

yingyinNormal.en: No I'm having fun. I'm really, excited for you and Ursula.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我觉得很开心。我为你跟乌苏拉感到高兴。

yingyinNormal.en: Now for some good news. We are very excited All right, Don.
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在，好消息，我们感到非常兴奋。好吧，唐。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 对...感到兴奋；为...感到激动

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 令人激动的；引起性兴奋的
adj. 激动的；兴奋的；已激发的；受激的；性兴奋的
n. 兴奋；激动；性兴奋；令人兴奋的事

word_family.mean: v. 使激动；使兴奋；刺激；引起；激起；激发；激励；激起…的性欲

examination_example.sentence: Larry Brown is <highlight>excited</highlight> about his progress in creating a sustainable system.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 拉里·布朗对他在创建可持续系统方面取得的进展感到兴奋。
我对我们的进展感到兴奋。

examination_example.sentence: Parents would be looking at their emails while the children would be making <highlight>excited</highlight> bids for their attention.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 父母会看着他们的电子邮件，而孩子们会兴奋地吸引他们的注意力。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 令人激动的；引起性兴奋的
adj. 激动的；兴奋的；已激发的；受激的；性兴奋的
n. 兴奋；激动；性兴奋；令人兴奋的事

word_family.mean: v. 使激动；使兴奋；刺激；引起；激起；激发；激励；激起…的性欲

examination_example.sentence: Because it is designed around an edited collection of possessions, limited to my favorite stuff, I'm really <highlight>excited</highlight> to live there.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因为它是围绕着编辑过的物品设计的，仅限于我最喜欢的东西，所以我很开心能够住在哪里。

examination_example.sentence: It looked at positive emotions such as being <highlight>excited</highlight> or interested, and negative emotions including being scared or distressed.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它着眼于积极情绪，如兴奋或感兴趣，以及消极情绪，包括害怕或痛苦。

examination_example.sentence: Sometimes a young child may get over-<highlight>excited</highlight>, and they are a little too rough, but it's never a serious matter.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有时候小孩子可能过于兴奋，他们有点太粗暴了，但是这从来不是一个严重的问题。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 令人激动的；引起性兴奋的
adj. 激动的；兴奋的；已激发的；受激的；性兴奋的
n. 兴奋；激动；性兴奋；令人兴奋的事

word_family.mean: v. 使激动；使兴奋；刺激；引起；激起；激发；激励；激起…的性欲

examination_example.sentence: I was <highlight>excited</highlight> because I had asked to research Chinese immigrants during that era.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我感到很兴奋，因为我主动要求过研究该时期的中国移民者。

examination_example.sentence: So far, visitors to the theme park have been <highlight>excited</highlight> to see the birds in action.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 到目前为止，主题公园的游客看到鸟儿在活动都很兴奋。

examination_example.sentence: I was <highlight>excited</highlight> when I learned this, figuring I had a full week to do the research.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当我知道这一点时，我很兴奋，因为我有整整一周的时间来做研究。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 令人激动的；引起性兴奋的
adj. 激动的；兴奋的；已激发的；受激的；性兴奋的
n. 兴奋；激动；性兴奋；令人兴奋的事

word_family.mean: v. 使激动；使兴奋；刺激；引起；激起；激发；激励；激起…的性欲

examination_example.sentence: Even if I weren't <highlight>excited</highlight> enough about free credits, news about our instructor was appealing enough to me.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管我对自由学分波澜不惊，但关于导师的消息对我足够有吸引力了。

examination_example.sentence: Instead of being discouraged by my slow progress, I was <highlight>excited</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我并没有因为我的缓慢进步气馁，反而很兴奋。

examination_example.sentence: You must be pretty <highlight>excited</highlight> about your trip to Europe, Dorothy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 多萝西，你对去欧洲旅行一定很兴奋。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 对…感到兴奋；为…感到激动

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 令人激动的；引起性兴奋的
adj. 激动的；兴奋的；已激发的；受激的；性兴奋的
n. 兴奋；激动；性兴奋；令人兴奋的事

word_family.mean: v. 使激动；使兴奋；刺激；引起；激起；激发；激励；激起…的性欲

examination_example.sentence: After hearing the exciting news, she got so <highlight>excited</highlight> that her eyes were filled with tears.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 听到这个激动人心的消息后，她激动得热泪盈眶。

examination_example.sentence: According to experts, we all feel <highlight>excited</highlight> after we buy something new.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据专家的说法，我们在购买新东西后都会感到兴奋。

examination_example.sentence: And they were even more <highlight>excited</highlight> after learning about the stories and culture behind them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在了解了背后的故事和文化后，他们更加兴奋。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 是以-ed结尾的形容词，意为“（人） 感到兴奋的；（人）感到激动的”，常用来修饰人。
是以-ing结尾的形容词，意为“令人兴奋的；令人激动的”，常用来修饰事或物。
